column1: Little Goat Diner////My partner and I grab coffee and pastries from the bakery almost every morning before I drop her off at work and we love it. This morning
column2: we decided to take a look at the full menu
column3: because I walked by a table on my way to the toilet and their food caught my eye (turned out to be the This Pig Went to China meal). We didn't have time this morning
column4: but we went back for lunch this afternoon. We've never been so disappointed by a meal before. After enjoying countless breakfasts in the bakery
column5: we've now come to find out that the hype about Little Goat's menu is unfounded. Both of our meals were essentially just plates full of grease. I ordered the China Pig thing
column6: and she ordered crumpets. Huge letdown.
